00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "VertexQM.hpp"
00035 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00036 #include "ElemSampleQM.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 VertexQM::~VertexQM() {}
00041 
00042 void VertexQM::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00043                                 std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00044                                 bool free_vertices_only, 
00045                                 MsqError& err )
00046 {
00047   get_vertex_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, err );
00048 }
00049 
00050 void VertexQM::get_vertex_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00051                                        std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00052                                        bool free_vertices_only, 
00053                                        MsqError& err )
00054 {
00055   if (free_vertices_only) {
00056     handles.resize( pd.num_free_vertices() );
00057     for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i)
00058       handles[i] = i;
00059   }
00060   else {
00061     handles.clear();
00062     handles.reserve( pd.num_nodes() );
00063     for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
00064       if (!(pd.vertex_by_index(i).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED))
00065         handles.push_back(i);
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00069 void VertexQM::get_vertex_corner_handles( PatchData& pd, 
00070                                           size_t vtx_idx,
00071                                           std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00072                                           MsqError& err )
00073 {
00074   size_t len;
00075   const size_t *elems = pd.get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vtx_idx, len, err );
00076   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00077   
00078   handles.resize(len);
00079   for (size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00080     const MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( elems[i] );
00081     const size_t* verts = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00082     const size_t* ptr = std::find( verts, verts+elem.node_count(), vtx_idx );
00083     unsigned idx = ptr - verts;
00084     handles[i] = ElemSampleQM::handle( Sample(0,idx), elems[i] );
00085   }
00086 }
00087
